guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • multicolor paper
Tools
  • Paper cutter
  • liquid paper glue

lines.text: Choose any different colors of paper that you desire and as much as you want.
lines.text_raw: Choose any different colors of paper that you desire and as much as you want.

lines.text: Mix all the colors together, then cut the papers into pieces 4¼" by 5½".
lines.text_raw: Mix all the colors together, then cut the papers into pieces 4¼" by 5½".

lines.text: If you are using 8½"x11" paper, after cutting it you will end up with four little pads.
lines.text_raw: If you are using 8½"x11" paper, after cutting it you will end up with four little pads.

lines.text: Hold opposite corners of the stack.
lines.text_raw: Hold opposite corners of the stack.

lines.text: Then twist your hands in opposite directions.
lines.text_raw: Then twist your hands in opposite directions.

lines.text: Turn the stack of paper around.
lines.text_raw: Turn the stack of paper around.

lines.text: Give at least 10 twists and you will see the results.
lines.text_raw: Give at least 10 twists and you will see the results.

lines.text: Glue one side of the spiral.
lines.text_raw: Glue one side of the spiral.

lines.text: The video will give you a better view of how to make the spiral and how to glue it.
